brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts an activity in which you must select the best summary route for each of the contiguous address groups shown. Select the answer that represents a summarization of each group of networks.

Group 1
192.168.0.0 /24
192.168.1.0 /24
192.168.2.0 /24
192.168.3.0 /24

Which of the following addresses does Group 1 summarize to?
a.192.168.4.0 /22.
b.192.168.1.0 /26.
c.192.168.4.0 /26.
d.192.168.0.0 /22.

Group 2
172.16.0.0 /16
172.17.0.0 /16

Which of the following addresses does Group 2 summarize to?
a.172.16.0.0 /15
b.172.16.0.0 /17
c.172.17.0.0 /15
d.172.17.0.0 /17

Group 3
10.3.5.0 /27
10.3.5.3 2 /27
10.3.5.6 4 /27
10.3.5.9 6 /27
10.3.5.1 28 /27
10.3.5.1 60 /27
10.3.5.1 92 /27
10.3.5.2 24 /27

Which of the following addresses does Group 3 summarize to?
a.10.3.5.0 /28
b.10.3.5.0 /25
c.10.3.5.0 /24
d.10.3.5.0 /26
